Block.name: skies
Block.description: Skies are referenced directly by the BSP tag.

ShortEnum.name: type
ShortEnum.description:
Determines the scenario type, which determines how a map should be compiled and loaded.
* For multiplayer maps, everything is put into a map. * For singleplayer maps, part of the globals tag is removed, and some of the tags are modified if `do not apply bungie campaign tag patches` is not set. * For user interface maps, most of the globals tag is removed.
For Xbox maps, this also determines the maximum cache file size.

Bit.name: cortana hack
Bit.description: use this to get 99 lives on super mario bros 2 the lost levels

Bit.name: use demo ui
Bit.description: changes what tags are used to build the cache file

Bit.name: enable color correction
Bit.description: makes the game look worse by running it through an ntsc-srgb filter

Bit.name: do not apply bungie campaign tag patches
Bit.description: disable patches made to various tags such as the pistol when building for singleplayer

Block.name: child scenarios
Block.description:
When this scenario is built into a cache file, all scripts, AI reflexives, and object spawns referenced by the child scenarios are merged into this scenario, after which this reflexive is cleared.
This is generally used for having one main scenario, with other parts of the scenario being worked on separately in child scenarios.

TagReference.name: child scenario
TagReference.description: This scenario tag will be merged into the main scenario tag (and dereferenced) on map build.

ShortInteger.name: desired permutation
ShortInteger.description: when non-zero the game will try use model permutations with a matching number suffix

ShortInteger.name: spawn time
ShortInteger.description: 0 = use default spawn time in item_collection

ShortInteger.name: variant numbers
ShortInteger.description: Determines which kind of variant gets a given line. By default, this matches by tag path (bisenti = 2, fitzgerald/jenkins = 4, aussie = 5, mendoza = 6, sarge/johnson = 100, sarge2/lehto = 101, everything else = 0, null = 65535)
